pull_request_title: Remove failure modes from segment status checker

commit.message:
Remove failure modes from segment status checker

Simplified the logic for the segment status checker, removing some
potential failure modes from the existing code:

- Exceptions in the segment status check loop now only cause metrics for
  that table to be unavailable, as opposed to bubbling out of the loop
- Emit Long.MIN_VALUE instead of 0 for unavailable data
- Remove flaky (and incorrect) logic that attempts to shut down and
  restart the thread based on leadership change, it is far too brittle
  for rather dubious performance gains

Minor improvements to the code:

- Emit a warning if the segment status checker is disabled, as opposed
  to silently not starting the segment status checker
- Rename segment status checker thread to "Segment status checker" from
  "SegStatChecker"
- Rename method "runSegmentMetrics" to "updateSegmentMetrics" to reflect
  its actual purpose
- Made "updateSegmentMetrics" package private as opposed to public
- Remove some pointless comments
